doc.previous: Compare the carved and incised sacred glyphs hieroglyphs which have had a longer history in English dating from the first Elizabethan translation of Plutarch who adopted hieroglyphic as a Latin adjective
doc.after: But the word glyph first came to widespread European attention with the engravings and lithographs from Frederick Catherwood s drawings of undeciphered glyphs of the Maya civilization in the early 1840s
